title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Competencies: Remote Education Program for Nursing Care of Newborns with Congenital Heart Defects

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Identify physiological characteristics and clinical symptoms of newborns with congenital heart defects with 80% accuracy.
Develop a nursing intervention plan applying the CHDF (Continuous Hemofiltration Dialysis Fluid) protocol via a remote education platform.
Develop interdisciplinary collaboration strategies through PBL team projects and apply them to at least three virtual case studies.
Demonstrate clinical applicability by achieving 75+ points on the comprehensive evaluation at the end of training.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
